ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 626
ygData.msgSnippet: Was thinking the sneak could be combined with invis to get past mobs that see thru invis.  Our rogue can hide/sneak past mobs that see right thru my invis now.
ygData.messageBody:
Was thinking the sneak could be combined with invis to get past mobs that
see thru invis. Our rogue can hide/sneak past mobs that see right thru my
invis now.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Peter Hollmer [mailto:phollmer@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 12:48 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 626


From: Peter Hollmer <phollmer@...>

I love sneak. When I hunt in cazic, I bind in ogguk.
With my sneak maxed I can almost always sneak past the
guards to get my bod. (I'm naked, and have no flute to
invis.) Why sneak while you're invis? Sneak slows you
down, and wears off suddenly. (I have mine maxed, at
75.) It's also not too reliable - so I only use it
when I have no choice. Ogres are almost always camped,
though - so it's usually no biggie.


Double Entendre

------------------------------------------------------

Message: 15
Date: Tue, 4 Jan 2000 11:25:21 -0700
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
Subject: RE: Dual Bard Invisibility Question

Yeah, that has always bugged me. How come we cannot
sneak while
invisible?
What good is Sneak at all if its becomes useless 2
levels after you get
it?
Oh well, just goes back to the theory of bards being
thrown together at
the
last minute again I guess.

Kit
